  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChainNotifierGrpc
    ChainNotifier is a service that can be used to get information about the chain backend by registering notifiers for chain events.
    ChainNotifierGrpc.ChainNotifierBlockingStub
    ChainNotifier is a service that can be used to get information about the chain backend by registering notifiers for chain events.
